gst.data

Class AnnotationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.data.AnnotationManager

  • public class AnnotationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds information of the selected AnnotationController and predefined annotations.
    Version:
    0.1.1 (10.08.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnnotationManager.Preset
      Enumeration for the predefined annotations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String comment
      stored information of the last written annotation comment
      private AnnotationController selectedAnnotationChannel
      the currently selected data channel to read from or write to
      private java.lang.String type
      stored information of the last written annotation type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnnotationManager()
      Constructor for objects with no selected channel and the first preset selected.

    • Method Detail

      • selectController

        public void selectController(AnnotationController actrl)
        Sets the selected channel.
        Parameters:
        actrl - the controller to use or null to clear selection

      • selectedController

        public AnnotationController selectedController()
        Returns:
        selectedAnnotationChannel

      • selectPreset

        public boolean selectPreset(AnnotationManager.Preset preset)
        Selects the preset to use.
        Parameters:
        preset - preset to use
        Returns:
        false if the preset is not defined, else true

      • addAnnotation

        public boolean addAnnotation(double time,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String comment)
        Writes an annotation to the slected channel.
        Parameters:
        time - point in time where the annotation belongs to
        type - the type
        comment - the comment
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false (no channel selected)

      • addAnnotation

        public boolean addAnnotation(double time)
        Writes an annotation the the selected channel. Type and comment are the same last used to write a annotation or of the previously selected preset
        Parameters:
        time - point in time where the annotation belongs to
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false (no channel selected)

      • removeAnnotation

        public int removeAnnotation(double time)
        Removes an annotation from the selected channel at the given point in time. Convenience method for removeAnnotation(double, double) with range == 0.
        Parameters:
        time - the point in time
        Returns:
        the number of annotations removed

      • removeAnnotation

        public int removeAnnotation(double time,
                   double range)
        Removes all annotations from the selected channel between time - range and time + range.
        Parameters:
        time - the central point in time
        range - the range
        Returns:
        the number of annotations removed

      • updateStatusAnnotationNear

        public void updateStatusAnnotationNear(double time,
                              double range)
        Updates the message of the StatusBar to represent the annotations in the given time range.
        Parameters:
        time - central point of time
        range - the range
